name: Chernobyl Again
summary: Chernobyl Again is an adventure game created for Virtual Reality headsets taking place in the 3D-scanned Chernobyl Exclusion Zone for a more immersive and engaging experience. You’ll get the chance to explore the Zone, feel its dark atmosphere, and follow the plot full of unexpected twists via different kind of puzzles, you’ll get to solve while traveling through space and time. Your main goal will be to stop the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant explosion, and the consequences we know it brought not only...
